mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_name, member_password, member_email_id, member_email_domain, member_birthdate, member_image_url) values (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{memberBirth}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName}, member_password = #{memberPassword}, member_email_id = #{emailId}, member_email_domain = #{emailDomain}, member_birthdate = #{memberBirth}, member_image_url = #{imageUrl} where member_id = #{memberId}
